title: Live Not By Masks
description:
“And we all, who with unveiled faces contemplate the Lord’s glory, are being transformed into his image with ever-increasing glory, which comes from the Lord, who is the Spirit” -- 2 Corinthians 3:18. We're getting ever more tangled up in lies. We need to discover the truth and find the courage to tell it. We need delicate discernment between those who are confused, those who are deluded, and those who are outright liars -- targeting us with malevolent intent.

James Kourtides, Live Not by Lies: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oBdYTAE6sIA
Rod Dreher: Live Not by Lies: A Manual for Christian Dissidents https://amzn.to/3hMFBgF 
The Close Read: Jeffrey Anderson on America’s Mask Regime: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pThyQACFoQ4 
The Masking of America by Jeffrey H. Anderson https://claremontreviewofbooks.com/the-masking-of-america/ 
Do Masks Work, A Review of the Evidence by Jeffrey H. Anderson https://www.city-journal.org/do-masks-work-a-review-of-the-evidence
Cloth Masks Are Useless Against COVID-19 by Frank Diamond, Infection Control Today, June 2020 https://www.infectioncontroltoday.com/view/cloth-masks-are-useless-against-covid-19 (On the danger that masks give a false sense of security to very vulnerable people.)

Mary Elizabeth Kochan How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
Bringing Joseph Ratzinger (Benedict XVI) into the converZation in Paul VanderKlay's little corner of the internet.
Introduction to Christianity: https://amzn.to/2A5pvZi
Pope Benedict XVI writings:  https://w2.vatican.va/content/benedict-xvi/en.html 
Paul VanderKlay’s channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg
Me on Paul's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o5q_5mVArNI
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN-PQ3uUm4Y
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mSiXzJkIj0c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdlMtQSKszc
Bridges of Meaning Discord https://discord.gg/gcMuVAzs 
Awakening from the Meaning Crisis (John Vervaeke): https://youtu.be/54l8_ewcOlY
Randos United: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEzWTLDYmL8soRdQec9Fsjw 
Karen Wong's channel, The Meaning Code: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgp_r6WlBwDSJrP43Mz07GQ
Sevilla King's channel, A Quality Existence: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6vg0HkKKlgsWk-3HfV-vnw  
Jonathon Pageau's channel, The Symbolic World: https://www.youtube.com/user/pageaujonathan/videos
